original_title: A History of the *Ugly* Christmas Sweater
overview: Join Abby Hornacek and Tom Shillue for the very American story of a once-tasteful holiday wardrobe staple that went from understated to gaudy to tongue-in-cheek party costume in about 40 years, keeping pace with the commercialization of Christmas itself.
title: A History of the *Ugly* Christmas Sweater
